comment: If ` F ` is an isomorphism from an ordinal ` A ` onto ` B ` , which is a subset of the ordinals, then ` F ` is a strictly monotonic function. Exercise 3 in [TakeutiZaring] p. 50. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 24-Nov-2011.)
